text: “dharmaya himi ayavaluni! allahvada, taman veta pahala karana lada (mema dharmaya)da, meyata pera (obata) pahala karana lada dæyada, api visvasa kirima misa, vena kisiyam væræddak oba apa veta dakinnehuda?”yi (nabiye! oba ovungen vimasa) “niyata vasayenma obagen vædi deneku papatarayan vasayen sitinnehuya. (obata sarilana phalavipaka nirayayi)” yayi pavasanu mænava
